meanings.definition: Having a simple type of stele in which the xylem is in the center and the phloem surrounds it.
meanings.sent1: The protostelic plant had its xylem at the center, making it easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the protostelic structure of the plant to understand its growth pattern.
meanings.sent3: The protostelic tree decided to switch things up and put its phloem in the center just for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the protostelic plants stood tall like ancient guardians with their unique stele arrangement.
meanings.sent5: The protostelic nature of the tree's stem made it stand out among the other plants.
